original_text: For they could not keep it at that time, because the priests had not sanctified themselves sufficiently, neither had the people gathered themselves together to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이는 성결하게 한 제사장들이 부족하고 백성도 예루살렘에 모이지 못하였으므로 그 정한 때에 지킬수 없었음이라

sentences.original_text: For they could not keep it at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 때에 그것을 지킬 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: because the priests had not sanctified themselves sufficiently
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 자신들을 충분히 성결하게 하지 못했기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: neither had the people gathered themselves together to Jerusalem
